Civic Tech meets Police Oversight in Austin, TX 📱󠁵󠁳󠁴󠁸󠁿

Jul 18, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • police
  • austin
  • oversight

We are joined by two folks from the City of Austin, Texas, including Farah Muscadin Director of the Office of Police Oversight and Marni Wilhite Head of Product, Communications and Technology Management. We’ll engage in a conversation about some work they’ve been doing to improve the way public feedback about the police there occurs.
